ygData.msgSnippet: The hologram of Destructor took a hideous grin. It was time for his true plan to take shape. He sent out a comm to megatron. Megatron. MY old friend. Right

Subject: The true program-megs

 The hologram of Destructor took a hideous grin. It was time for his true 
plan to take shape. He sent out a comm to megatron. "Megatron. MY old friend. 
Right now my base his hovering over soon to be london. I have lured the one 
known as Drill bit to come here. Where I hope you will be waiting to kill 
him. I wish you take my base. You are the true predacon leader. That Drillbit 
stole my love from me. And he let her die. The green button is the activation 
to my auto defences. You already know your way around. I await you decesion.
